transcription_data.text: We all know someone who has deconstructed their faith, right? Maybe we even have ourselves. Or maybe we're just skeptical about it all. Religion, faith, God. Regardless, here's what we know. We all have unanswered questions. We all have unquestioned answers. And every one of us has doubts. But why does it end there? There are answers to hard-hitting questions, and our faith can be built on something solid or rebuilt. Join us as we dive into these conversations. We aren't here to stop you from taking things apart brick by brick. We just don't want you to stop there. This is Reconstructed Faith.

segments.text: We all know someone who has deconstructed their faith, right?
Or maybe we're just skeptical about it all.
And every one of us has doubts.
But why does it end there?
There are answers to hard-hitting questions, and our faith can be built on something solid
Join us as we dive into these conversations.
We aren't here to stop you from taking things apart brick by brick.
We just don't want you to stop there.
